proof.th: ⊢ abs x / abs (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1) < 1 ⟷ abs x < 1 * abs (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1)

content.name: halfatn_half

proof.th: abs x < t ⊢ abs x < t
⊢ abs x / (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1) < t / 2 ⟷ abs x < t / 2 * (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1)
abs x < t ⊢ t ≤ t * ((sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1) / 2)
abs x < t ⊢ t ≤ t / 2 * (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1)
abs x < t ⊢ abs x < t / 2 * (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1)
abs x < t ⊢ abs x / (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1) < t / 2
abs x < t ⊢ abs x / abs (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1) < t / 2
abs x < t ⊢ abs (x / (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1)) < t / 2
abs x < t ⊢ abs (halfatn x) < t / 2
⊢ abs x < t ⟶ abs (halfatn x) < t / 2

content.prop: abs x < t ⟶ abs (halfatn x) < t / 2

proof.th: ⊢ atn (halfatn x) + atn (halfatn x) = atn ((halfatn x + halfatn x) / (1 - halfatn x * halfatn x))

proof.args: eq_lemma, x = 2 * halfatn x / (1 - halfatn x ^ (2::nat))
atn x = atn (2 * halfatn x / (1 - halfatn x ^ (2::nat)))
proof.th: ⊢ atn x = atn (2 * halfatn x / (1 - halfatn x ^ (2::nat)))

proof.args: real_pow_2, atn x = atn (2 * halfatn x / (1 - halfatn x * halfatn x))
proof.th: ⊢ atn x = atn (2 * halfatn x / (1 - halfatn x * halfatn x))

proof.args: real_mul_2, atn x = atn ((halfatn x + halfatn x) / (1 - halfatn x * halfatn x))
proof.th: ⊢ atn x = atn ((halfatn x + halfatn x) / (1 - halfatn x * halfatn x))

proof.args: atn x = atn (halfatn x) + atn (halfatn x)
proof.th: ⊢ atn x = atn (halfatn x) + atn (halfatn x)

proof.args: if_P, -x / (sqrt (1 + (if even 2 then x ^ (2::nat) else -(x ^ (2::nat)))) + 1) = -(x / (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1))
if_P1, {P: 0 < sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1, a: (1::real), b: if sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1 < 0 then -(1::real) else 0}
proof.th: ⊢ (if 0 < sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1 then (1::real) else if sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1 < 0 then -1 else 0) = 1

proof.args: real_sgn x / real_sgn (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1) = real_sgn x
proof.th: ⊢ real_sgn x / real_sgn (sqrt (1 + x ^ (2::nat)) + 1) = real_sgn x

name: trig_atn
